usefulItems: baking paper, bowl, baking tray (30 x 40 cm), oven
title: Crunchy seeded broccoli

ingredients.content: 40 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (2 cm)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray (30 x 40 cm) with baking paper.
Place Parmesan, sunflower seeds, linseeds (flaxseeds), coconut flour and sumac into mixing bowl and mill <b>5 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add dukkah (optional) and mix <b>3 sec//speed 2<b>, then transfer into a bowl.

Crack eggs into a separate bowl and beat lightly with a fork. Dip broccoli florets into egg, making sure florets are completely coated, then dip into the seed mixture. Transfer onto prepared baking tray and continue coating remaining broccoli.
Spray broccoli lightly with oil and bake for 25-30 minutes (180°C), turning over halfway through baking. Serve as side dish or as a healthy snack with your favourite dipping sauce (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: If you want to make your own dukkah, try our Hazelnut dukkah with fennel (please refer to the recipe on this recipe chip).
You can serve this dish with any kind of sauce. We suggest the Avocado dressing or try stirring some Coriander pesto through mayonnaise (please refer to the recipes on this recipe chip).
